now-vacant desk in the oenter of the last row in the chamber of deputies* the man called
Aloide de Oasperi*
Graham Hovey reporting* This second of two Letters from Italy on the Italian
political scene was recorded in Home studies of Hadiotelevisione Italians for the
National Association of Bduontional Broadcasters — and this is the NAEB Network.
